price: Àti pé dájúdájú A mọ àwọn olùgbawájú nínú yín. Dájúdájú A sì mọ àwọn olùgbẹ̀yìn.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا ٱلۡمُسۡتَقۡدِمِينَ مِنكُمۡ وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا ٱلۡمُسۡتَـٔۡخِرِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ʿalim'nā al-mus'taqdimīna minkum walaqad ʿalim'nā al-mus'takhirīna
